title: Chibi Azir [Artwork]
body:
http://stacona.deviantart.com/art/Chibi-Azir-492571543?ga_submit_new=10%253A1415128926

"Caw caw sizzle CAW!"
Translation: "Your emperor has returned, Summoners!"
Google Translate: Bacon Hawk --> English : "Fat taco spring blaze turtle, Rito!"

Dang-it Google, not even close as usual... -_-

Like to support me? Add me to your deviantWATCH! http://stacona.deviantart.com/
~ Stacona

replies.body: Oh man, I clicked on this even WITHOUT getting baited.  The kawaii is strong with this one.
Welcome back to the nest baconhawk ^.^

Ok, I have a few requests; please do {{champion:3}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:115}} and {{champion:26}}. Thank you.

I have been maining new soraka mid in solo queue- so this might be seen very soon-- janna is about to get ugly after the splash "update" which is very much a downgrade, i love janna's current splash art. Why you got to change it Rito? WHY!!!?? also main veigar support - so these are high candidates, and of course my boy and void puppy Koggers <3

But on a side note, just because Rito said not to make Schoolgirl Vel'Koz I really want to try making a school girl Vel'Koz just because they said not to [granted, this may be a reverse psychology trap and Riot really want schoolgirl Vel'Koz and just said not to do it to try to get someone to draw it =P but i don't care, Admiral Ackbar, trap or not i think it would be hilariously awesome either way]

Thanks! ^.^
I wish i knew how to set up a thumbnail for the outside post though

You're welcome! 
I know the feeling. I made a Harrowing Poro but didnt include my link xD I thought it looked better without it xD
Im going to go follow you when I get home though!

Yea, I am trying to grow my deviant art, fanart is probably better because more places i can share fanart-
Also fun fact, Azir has technically 5 fingers and a thumb in the official splash art, and his right [his right] headpiece is reversed to his left which i did not notice until now [neither did Riot apparently as it is in his official splash with the two headpieces in opposite directions to each other] --- #thingsyounoticeaftertheprojectiscompleted

Fan art is always good! :)
Isnt it funny how that happens? xD 
I didnt notice that!
you mainly notice small details when you are drawing- usually i just correct it, but i didnt even catch it until just now- lol
